title: Hubble Studies a Nearby Galaxy’s Star Formation
summary: This NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope image features the picturesque spiral galaxy NGC 4941, which lies about 67 million light-years from Earth in the constellation Virgo (The Maiden).
